member.name: T:JIRAConnector.Common.LogManager
member.summary: Manages the writing of debug and log messages to the output window of Visual Studio

member.name: M:JIRAConnector.Common.LogManager.WriteMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a mesagge to the output window of Visual Studio

member.name: M:JIRAConnector.Common.LogManager.WriteDebugMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a debug message to the output window of Visual Studio, ONLY if the option "debug-mode=true" is set in the configuration file
